titles.title: Stop Junk Health Plans Act of 2018
To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to include short-term limited duration plans in the definition of individual health insurance coverage.
Stop Junk Health Plans Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Stop Junk Health Plans Act of 2018
This bill includes short-term, limited-duration insurance in the definition of individual health insurance coverage under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, thereby subjecting such insurance to the same requirements (e.g., coverage of preexisting conditions).
